channel.title: I ned help with Java and locations
channel.description: Whenever I try to open the compile or the runserver it says that "javac" and "java" cannot be found, but that isn't the problem. I understand that you have to change the PATH in the Environmental Variables, however, I have no idea as to what you are supposed to change the variable to. Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: I ned help with Java and locations
item.dc:creator: @Randomhero Randomhero
item.description:
@Randomhero wrote:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

[br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2007, 04:48:43 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
